snippet: Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi is running for re-election on Tuesday against an opponent who has gained support from Mr. Mirkarimi’s own deputies and staff members.
abstract: Political observers say incumbent San Francisco Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi is unlikely to be re-elected, despite fact that his progressive politics are more of match to liberal city than those of his opponent Vicki Hennessy; Mirkarimi's tenure has been characterized by series of scandals, which has led even many of his own deputies and staff members to support Hennessy.
lead_paragraph: Sheriff Ross Mirkarimi is running for re-election on Tuesday against an opponent who has gained support from Mr. Mirkarimi’s own deputies and staff members.

headline.print_headline: Scandal-Plagued Sheriff Limps to Election Day
headline.main: Scandal-Plagued San Francisco Sheriff Limps to Election Day
